name: @opuscapita/event-client
description: An event client to handle the event system in microservices architecture.

scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc mocha --timeout 50000 --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-raw: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc mocha --timeout 50000 --recursive
scripts.test-coverage: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --timeout 50000 && sed -i 's/\/home\/node\/event-client\//\.\//g' coverage/lcov.info
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch -m 'Version set to %s. [skip ci]'

author: Christian Drengenberg <christian.drengenberg@opuscapita.com>
